audioText: Cette nouvelle était infiniment plus difficile à accepter que toute autre peine attendue dans sa vie professionnelle.
question: How did the person feel about this news compared to other difficulties?
options: It was infinitely more difficult to accept
It was slightly easier to understand
explanation: The text states 'Cette nouvelle était infiniment plus difficile à accepter que toute autre peine attendue dans sa vie professionnelle' - This news was infinitely more difficult to accept than any other hardship expected in their professional life. 'Infiniment' means infinitely, 'peine' means hardship/trouble, and 'attendue' is the past participle of attendre (to expect).
